name: virtualDCS
tag_list: cloud-computing, enterprise-hosting, virtualdcs, data-centre-services, private-cloud, recovery-as-a-service, infrastructure-as-a-service, iaas, raas, software-as-a-service, saas
overview:
virtualDCS are cloud computing experts, based in Leeds West Yorkshire. The company specialises in Recovery as a Service (RaaS), Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), CloudTop solutions, Private clouds, Software as a Service (SaaS) and Voice as a Service (VaaS).

-Virtual Data Centre services (virtualDCS) were established in 2008 by Richard May and John Murray.

-Using the latest Cloud Computing technology from VMware, their solution delivers significant cost savings, improved availability and reduced carbon emissions.

For more information, please visit www.virtualdcs.co.uk or call a Cloud expert on 08453 888 327.
